hero.title: MedSupply Solutions
hero.subtitle: Trusted medical supplies for healthcare professionals

history.title: Our History
history.content: Founded in 2010, MedSupply Solutions began as a regional distributor and has grown into a national leader in medical surgical supplies.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To be the most trusted partner in healthcare supply chain solutions across North America.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To provide healthcare professionals with reliable, high-quality medical supplies through exceptional service.

items.title: Quality
items.content: We maintain the highest standards for all our medical products, ensuring safety and reliability.

items.title: Reliability
items.content: Healthcare providers trust us for on-time delivery of critical supplies when they're needed most.

items.title: Partnership
items.content: We build long-term relationships with healthcare providers, understanding their unique needs.

commitment.title: Our Commitment to Healthcare
commitment.subtitle: What makes us different in medical supply distribution

sections.title: Quality Assurance
sections.content: We source only from certified manufacturers and maintain rigorous quality control.

sections.title: Reliable Distribution
sections.content: Our logistics network ensures timely delivery to healthcare facilities nationwide.

timeline.title: Our Growth Journey
timeline.subtitle: Milestones that shaped our company's success story

items.content: Founded as a regional medical supplier in Chicago.
Expanded to serve the entire Midwest region.
Launched our e-commerce platform for healthcare providers.
Opened two new distribution centers on East and West coasts.
